key_facts.fact: Bene was used to raise funds for Gluon Gold with a goal of 5,000 ERG
key_facts.speaker: Josemi

key_facts.fact: Gluon Gold vault had a rate of one Gluon per ERG and a two-week deadline
key_facts.speaker: Josemi

key_facts.fact: Example project for Ergo articles with goal of 500 ERGs, rate of 1 EAT per ERG, and 2 week deadline
key_facts.speaker: Josemi

key_facts.fact: Bene has implementations on both Ethereum and Ergo
key_facts.speaker: Josemi

key_facts.fact: Bene on Ergo implementation is a web app running with observers only in the browser
key_facts.speaker: Josemi

key_facts.fact: Gluon Gold security audit was completed a few months ago using Bene
key_facts.speaker: Josemi
